component.name: Catgen
component.summary: Generate astronomical objects catalogs for use with Skychart

description.p: Catgen is a utility for generating astronomical objects catalogs that can be imported and used with Skychart planetarium.

Due to the large amount of available data, it would be impossible to make a choice that will fit everyone's needs. When you have a specific interest, you can use CatGen to build your own data set from the original professional catalog data. You can also use any new catalog without delay, as soon as it is published.
